dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement by toyscamp.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2006 2:18 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement by toyscamp.com

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, February 28,
2006 at
11:59:18 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Copyright infringement by toyscamp.com

MESSAGE BODY:
To whom it may concern:

Please be advised, your customer, toyscamp.com owned and operated by
Toyscamp, Inc. located at 3 Aerie Wynde Drive, Denville, New Jersey
07834 is in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act by exhibiting
pictures on their web site created and owned by Live And Learn, Inc. without
due permission.

In addition, toyscamp.com was notified on two occasions of the violation,
and was kindly requested to remove the offending pictures. 
Unfortunately, our contact to toyscamp.com was ignored on both occasions
  and the copyrighted material is still on their web site.

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, as the hosting service for
toyscamp.com we are officially notifying you of the infringement and request
the offending material be removed or the site shut down until the offending
material is removed.

Although we trust that legal action will not be necessary, if the offending
material is not removed, or the web site taken down within the next 48
hours, we will have no choice, but to include theplanet.com as a party in
any actions we take as provided by the appropriate provisions of the
Millennium Copyright Act.

The offending material are two graphics pictures of a toy named Caroline
Cottontail Bride located at located at the following web addresses:

http://toyscamp.com/viewproduct.asp?productId=IPICC2182

http://toyscamp.com/ShowbyCharacter.asp?CharacterId=10

We thank you in advance for your cooperation in this matter. If you have any
questions please do not hesitate contacting us.

Sincerely,
Howard Hirsch, Lottie Hirsch, Owners
Live And Learn, Inc.

--
Live And Learn...the oldest online toy store.

Voted Best Online Toy Store By Baltimore Magazine!

Web: http://www.liveandlearn.com
Email: howie@liveandlearn.com
Phone: 443-394-8501
